body_html:
I think that's just the stack trace of the launcher process that's waiting for children python processes. To figure out why child python process is hanging you could get its pid and do

gdb -p <pid>
# for main thread
gdb bt
# or for all threads
gdb apply all bt
body_text:
I think that's just the stack trace of the launcher process that's waiting for children python processes. To figure out why child python process is hanging you could get its pid and do
gdb -p <pid>
# for main thread
gdb bt
# or for all threads
gdb apply all bt
body:
I think that's just the stack trace of the launcher process that's waiting for children python processes. To figure out why child python process is hanging you could get its pid and do 

```
gdb -p <pid>
# for main thread
gdb bt
# or for all threads
gdb apply all bt
```
